briefdescription.para: Converts the values of the given raw_value into a physical unit.

simplesect.para: A float32_t value representing the value in the physical unit of the given channel.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t adc_num, uint8_t channel_num, float32_t gain, float32_t offset)
memberdef.name: data_conversion_set_conversion_parameters_linear

briefdescription.para: Set the conversion type for a given channel to linear and set parameters values.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t adc_num, uint8_t channel_num, float32_t r0, float32_t b, float32_t rdiv, float32_t t0)
memberdef.name: data_conversion_set_conversion_parameters_therm

briefdescription.para: Set the conversion type for a given channel to therm and set parameters values.
Get the conversion type for a given channel.
Get a conversion parameter for a given channel.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the parameter to retrieve. E.g. for linear parameters, gain is param 1 and offset is param 2.

simplesect.para: Current value of the given parameter.

briefdescription.para: Store the currently configured conversion parameters of a given channel in NVS.

simplesect.para: 0 if parameters were correctly stored, -1 if there was an error.

inbodydescription.para: Handle non volatile memory used to store ADC parameters Flash partition reserved to user data storage is 4kB long We have to mount the file system then we extract one memory page that is 4kB long that contains the data and write the relevant addresses to store ADC parameters.

The data structure is as follows:
1 byte indicating the channel descriptor string size
The channel descriptor string (should be max. 23 bytes in current version)
1 byte indicating ADC number
1 byte indicating channel number
1 byte indicating number of conversion parameters
Array of conversion parameters, each using 4 bytes.

briefdescription.para: Retrieved previously configured conversion parameters from NVS.

simplesect.para: 0 if parameters were correctly retrieved, negative value if there was an error:

listitem.para: -2: NVS contains data, but their version doesn't match current version
-4: NVS contains data, but not for the requested channel
